response.overview: Scorsese on Imamura is a 2007 documentary TV movie featuring filmmaker Martin Scorsese exploring the life, work, and influence of Japanese director Shōhei Imamura, a major figure in post-war cinema. It blends interviews, critical insight, and film clips to illuminate Imamura’s distinctive approach to storytelling and his impact on world cinema.
response.title: Scorsese on Imamura
